name: x402engine
description: Pay-per-call API gateway for AI agents. 47 tools including image generation, LLM inference (28 models), code execution, audio transcription, crypto data, wallet analytics, ENS, IPFS, web scraping, and transaction simulation. All via HTTP 402 micropayments with USDC and USDm.

skills.name: Image Generation
skills.description: Generate images using AI (fast, quality, and text-in-image tiers). Prices: $0.015-$0.12 per image.
examples: Generate a photo of a sunset over mountains
Create a logo with the text 'Hello World'

skills.name: LLM Inference
skills.description: Access 28 LLM models including GPT-5.2, GPT-5.2 Codex, Claude Opus 4.6, Gemini 2.5, DeepSeek, Llama, Grok, Kimi, MiniMax, GLM, Seed, Devstral, Qwen, Mistral, and Perplexity. Prices: $0.002-$0.09 per request.
examples: Ask GPT-5 to summarize this document
Get Claude Opus to review this code

skills.name: Code Execution
skills.description: Execute code in a sandboxed environment. Supports Python, JavaScript, Bash, R, Ruby, Go, and Rust. Price: $0.005 per execution.
examples: Execute a data analysis in R

skills.name: Audio Processing
skills.description: Transcribe audio to text (Deepgram Nova-3) and generate speech from text (OpenAI, ElevenLabs). Prices: $0.01-$0.10.

skills.name: Crypto Market Data
skills.description: Real-time crypto prices, market data, historical charts, trending coins, and search. Prices: $0.001-$0.003.
examples: Get the current price of Bitcoin

skills.name: Wallet Analytics
skills.description: Token balances, transaction history, token prices, and metadata for any blockchain wallet. Prices: $0.002-$0.005.
examples: Get transaction history for this wallet

skills.name: NFT Data
skills.description: NFT metadata, ownership history, and collection statistics. Price: $0.005 per query.

skills.name: ENS Resolution
skills.description: Resolve ENS names to addresses and reverse lookup. Price: $0.001.

skills.name: IPFS Storage
skills.description: Pin JSON data to IPFS and retrieve content by CID. Prices: $0.001-$0.01.

skills.name: Web Scraping & Screenshots
skills.description: Scrape web page content and capture screenshots. Prices: $0.005-$0.01.
examples: Scrape the content of this URL
Take a screenshot of this website

skills.name: Travel Search
skills.description: Search flights, hotels, airports, and find cheapest travel dates. Price: $0.005-$0.01.
examples: Find flights from NYC to London

skills.name: Transaction Simulation
skills.description: Simulate EVM transactions to preview outcomes before execution. Price: $0.01.
examples: Preview what happens if I send this tx

skills.name: Text Embeddings
skills.description: Generate text embeddings for semantic search and similarity. Price: $0.001.
